sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL ( SALES_MODE_NO, SALES_MODE_ID, SALES_MODE_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATED_BY, ACTIVITY, CPNY_ID, STATUS, MOBILE_STATUS) VALUES( PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'SM'||PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL_SEQ.CURRVAL, #SALES_MODE_NAME#, #REMARK#, SYSDATE, #CREATED_BY#, 1, #CPNY_ID#, #STATUS_IN#, 0)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL SET SALES_MODE_NAME = #SALES_MODE_NAME#, REMARK = #REMARK#, STATUS = #STATUS_IN#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY# WHERE SALES_MODE_NO = #SALES_MODE_NO# AND ACTIVITY = 1 AND CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL SET ACTIVITY = 0, UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE SALES_MODE_NO = #SALES_MODE_NO# AND ACTIVITY = 1 AND CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
